name: Find the Differences - World Adventurer Pro
name_original: Find the Differences - World Adventurer Pro
description:
How fast can you find 5 differences?

"Find the Differences World Adventurer" takes you on a journey around the world to your favorite destinations


A CASUAL CLASSIC GAME FOR YOU
• The clock is ticking – find those differences quickly
• Each mistake will cost you time against the clock
• You have 3 hints to help you along the way
• Save your score and compare with friends
• Hours of gameplay with tons of photos to keep you entertained
